statements: DELETE FROM robot_movement WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 12:00:00' AND speed < 0.5;
DELETE FROM robot_movement WHERE robot_id = 'c8d0839d-6ecb-4eea-80c2-c4f08a97c0e5' AND direction = 'north';
DELETE FROM navigation_history WHERE navigation_id = 100 AND navigation_type = 'Shortest Path';
DELETE FROM robot_movement_history WHERE robot_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM NavigationHistory WHERE from_location = 'Point A' AND to_location = 'Point B';
DELETE FROM NavigationHistory WHERE from_location = 'Warehouse' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM RobotPaths WHERE robot_id = 1 AND distance > 100
DELETE FROM PathHistory WHERE completed = false AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM RobotPaths WHERE path_id = 100 AND robot_id = 5;
